name: Slime Adventure (itch) (simsa55)
description:
Slime Adventure

Slime Adventure is a Celeste inspiriert 2D platformer featuring a slime who goes on an adventure.

Including :

Power ups.

Collectables.

Unlockable skins .

Speedrun mode.

Controls : (Keyboard / Dualshock / Xbox )

Walk = WASD / Left stick

Jump = J / X / A

Wall climb = L / L1 / LB

Sprint = Shift  / R1 / RB

Dash = K / Square / X

Cheats :

Unlock all abilities = Numpad 7

Toggle spikes = Numpad 8

(Cheats are disabled when speedrun mode is turned on)
